mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.rcpt_no AS "rcptNo", a.payment_no AS "paymentNo", a.money_type AS "moneyType", a.payment_amount AS "paymentAmount", a.refunded_amount AS "refundedAmount", a.prepay_no AS "prepayNo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO outp_payments_money( id, rcpt_no, payment_no, money_type, payment_amount, refunded_amount, prepay_no, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{rcptNo}, #{paymentNo}, #{moneyType}, #{paymentAmount}, #{refundedAmount}, #{prepayNo}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE outp_payments_money SET rcpt_no = #{rcptNo}, payment_no = #{paymentNo}, money_type = #{moneyType}, payment_amount = #{paymentAmount}, refunded_amount = #{refundedAmount}, prepay_no = #{prepayNo}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT opm.MONEY_TYPE as "moneyType", sum(opm.PAYMENT_AMOUNT) as "paymentAmount", sum(opm.REFUNDED_AMOUNT) as "refundedAmount", sum(opm.PAYMENT_AMOUNT) as "paymentAmount" FROM OUTP_RCPT_MASTER orm, OUTP_PAYMENTS_MONEY opm WHERE orm.RCPT_NO = opm.RCPT_NO AND orm.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND opm.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND orm.acct_no is null
AND orm.operator_no = #{operatorNo}
AND orm.VISIT_DATE <= to_date(#{visitDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
GROUP BY opm.MONEY_TYPE
